demos.name: PowerICA
demos.description: PowerICA is a numerically stable ICA algorithm, which is especially useful when the sample size is not orders of magnitude larger than the data dimensionality. This MATLAB package is an implementation of Algorithm 1 proposed in: S. Basiri, E. Ollila, and V. Koivunen, _"Alternative derivation of FastICA with novel power iteration algorithm,"_ IEEE Signal Processing Letters, vol. 24, no. 9, pp. 1378-1382, Sept 2017.
